column4: i interupted an upgrade to hardy and now i cant graphicaly login to my laptop can anyone help me please?
i interupted an upgrade to hardy and now i cant graphicaly login to my laptop can anyone help me please?
i can login with text only
run sudo apt-get dist-upgrade to finish your upgrade
it doesnt work, it says "E: dpkg was interupted etc....
sudo dpkg -a reconfigure or what ever it tells you do to
try alt + F2 to get a new screen
try to install pastebinit it will let you paste in text only
you can use the web in text, the web is just fancy text to begin with but pastebinit is a program that will auto paste for you and give a url as output
you can pm me the spam i dont care
oo that is true... type me the main parts of it
you can leave out repeated stuff or verion number
